entry.title: Russia Says It Is Targeting Ukrainian Weapons Coming From the West
entry.content: Russia said it struck military equipment that Ukraine received from the U.S. and European countries, in what would be Moscow’s latest move aimed at disrupting the flow of Western weapons as its offensive in the east appears to have stalled.

entry.title: Ukrainian Holocaust Survivors Flee to Germany From Russian Bombs
entry.content: Russia’s invasion is seeing Ukrainian Holocaust survivors evacuating to Germany in a tragic twist of history that has uprooted them again in the twilight of their lives.

entry.title: Kushner's New Fund to Invest Saudi Money in Israel
entry.content: Saudi Arabia’s sovereign-wealth fund committed $2 billion to Jared Kushner’s Affinity Partners, agreeing to allow investment in Israeli firms for the first time.

entry.title: France's Emmanuel Macron Begins Second Term With Call for Unity
entry.content: In an inaugural speech, the French president pledged to turn the page on his first term, in which he wielded authority without building political consensus.

entry.title: Mass Graves in Ukraine Reveal Mounting Death Toll
entry.content: Analysis of satellite imagery shows expanding mass burial sites outside of Kyiv and Mariupol.
